title: (Mac) Client keeps freezing before loading me into a game
body: This has happened to me about 10 different times. I've gotten a leaverbuster, and I almost always let my teammates down because I'm about a level or 2 down from the enemy laner all because of the client always freezing.

replies.body: Your issue may be due to a network problem that's unable to communicate what's happening in the game and resulting in this freeze.  As a first step, I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out that possibility.  Let me know if that does the trick!

unfortunately, the computer I'm using is a school computer. As such, I have no access to Admin privileges so the HRT couldn't get that much info. 
But I'm almost positive it's not internet issues, i get an average of 75 ms in-game, but I think the problem lies in the UserKernel. It freezes also while doing whatever it does before bringing up the patcher.
